title: Shipwreck 1.4 apk
description:
Shipwreck 1.4

Shipwreck is a remake of the PC game â€žSchiffbruchâ€œ by Dirk Plate.

Shipwreck is a tricky adventure, strategy and simulation game. You are stranded on a lonely island and for now have no hope of getting rescued. You have to find a way to get off the island. Therefore you should discover the island first and try to survive.

Features:
- build housings and an infrastructure to survive
- craft new items
- solve the puzzle to get rescued
- randomly generated map
- search and collect items on the island
- Playstore integration

What's new:
- new game mode: endless
- normal mode is now more difficult
- new PlayGames leaderboard and scoring system
- rarely occurring blocking fixed
- other bugfixes and improvements

Requires Android 2.3 and up
